PHRASE.LANG: kName
Winter Holiday Polar Bear Companion 2011
Polaire ours Compagnon 2011
Eisbär-Freund für den Winterurlaub 2011
Compagno orso polare vacanze invernali 2011
Oso polar mascota, vacaciones de invierno 2011.
크리스마스 연휴 북극곰 친구
Winter Holiday Polar Bear Companion 2011
冬季假期北極熊隨身夥伴2011
冬季假期北極熊隨身夥伴2011
Winter Holiday Polar Bear Companion 2011
kDesc
This Plush Polar Bear companion is flying off the shelf. It's sure to be a hit and you can only earn one in the Winter Event 2011! [#Legal]
Cet ours polaire en peluche s'arrache cet hiver. Il va forcément se vendre comme des petits pains et vous ne pouvez l'obtenir que lors de l'Événement hiver 2011 ! [#Legal]
Dieser plüschig-bärige Gefährte bringt jede Eisscholle zum Schmelzen. Er wird bestimmt der absolute Hit und ist nur zum Winter-Event 2011 erhältlich. [#Legal]
Questo morbido compagno orso polare arriva impacchettato e pronto. Sarà sicuramente un successone e lo potrai ottenere solo durante l'Evento Invernale 2011! [#Legal]
Este oso polar mascota desaparecerá de las estanterías. ¡Va a ser un bombazo y solo podrás obtenerlo en el evento de invierno de 2011! [#Legal]
이 안락한 북극곰 친구는 최고입니다. 이 친구는 분명 히트를 칠텐데, 오직 2011 겨울 이벤트에서만 받을 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
This Plush Polar Bear companion is flying off the shelf. It's sure to be a hit and you can only earn one in the Winter Event 2011! [#Legal]
這隻毛絨的北極熊隨身夥伴從架上動起來了!它必定會大受歡迎，而你只能在2011冬季活動中贏得一隻! [#Legal]
這隻毛絨的北極熊隨身夥伴從架上動起來了!它必定會大受歡迎，而你只能在2011冬季活動中贏得一隻! [#Legal]
This Plush Polar Bear companion is flying off the shelf. It's sure to be a hit and you can only earn one in the Winter Event 2011! [#Legal]
